properties.text:
1) No griefing or stealing. If you didn't build it, don't touch!

2) No nonconsensual PvP.

3) Respect property rights. Don't build near others without consent.

4) Keep chat clean, use local chat when possible, keep swearing at a minimum.

5) Don't be rude to, harass, or say otherwise demeaning things to others.

6) No cheating or use of exploits. Includes but is not limited to: xray mods and texturepacks, taking advantage of a mod bug to dupe materials.

NB: any build found causing lag will be disabled. We scan with Opis very often. If the same build is found to be causing lag after a warning has been issued, the owner will receive a ban. Remember that you are playing with others!
